amendatorysection.para: All impeachments of state officers shall be tried before the Supreme Court, except that the impeachment of a judge of the Supreme Court shall be tried before the Court of Appeals sitting en banc.

annotation.para: An impeachment must be tried by the Supreme Court. State v. Douglas, 217 Neb. 199, 349 N.W.2d 870 (1984).
Trial of impeachments before Supreme Court is a judicial investigation according to judicial methods. State v. Hastings, 37 Neb. 96, 55 N.W. 774 (1893).
